ActorTalk: Oh? So you really were looking forward to our little "date"!
Still playing it cool? Maybe I should've made you wait even longer.
You look like you're in a hurry. Looking for someone, Commandant?
Tell me, was there a moment you thought I'd stand you up? Leave you here all alone in the cold?
I've got to admit, the square's actually looking decent. Lots of grinning fools around. You've got a real talent for keeping them entertained.
But my standards are just a little bit higher than theirs.
I've been very busy lately. Had to turn down a good number of beatdowns and arrests just to make time for this.
I've been looking forward to this celebration. If it doesn't impress me, I'm afraid I'll have to give you a little "punishment."
Hmm... Aren't you greedy.
Alright, if today's celebration meets my expectations, I'll give you a proper reward.
Then show meâ€”what brilliant idea does the famous Gray Raven Commandant have to entertain me?
Vera...
I'm looking for you.
Yes.
No.
Meaning...?
"Just a little bit"?
If there's punishment, does that mean there's a reward too?
Let's go then.
I'm confident you'll like it.
